items.title: Donald Trump Plans on Executing Immigration Plan Through 'Management'
items.body: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump today defended his newly released immigration reform plan, which calls for the deportation of millions of undocumented workers in the United States, saying he'll accomplish the objectives through 'management.'

items.title: Japan's spacecraft arrives early to ISS
items.body: he Japanese cargo craft 'Kounotori', carrying food and spare parts to the International Space Station, has arrived 20 minutes earlier then expected.
